function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased reliance on non-contact interaction","Impact":"Reduced in-person social interaction and potential decrease in community cohesion","Mitigation":"Promote hybrid models of interaction to maintain in-person connection while leveraging non-contact methods","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, smart community management systems","People":"Community residents","Owner":"Community planners"},{"Description":"Fundamental change in the concept of community space","Impact":"Disruption of traditional community space usage and potential loss of community identity","Mitigation":"Engage community members in redefining and preserving the essence of community space","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, spatial analysis tools","People":"Community residents, local authorities","Owner":"Community planners"},{"Description":"Integration of virtual and physical space in the community","Impact":"Increased complexity in managing and maintaining a hybrid physical-virtual community environment","Mitigation":"Develop clear guidelines and protocols for managing hybrid spaces and technology integration","Technologies":"IoT devices, sensor networks, digital community management tools","People":"Community residents, technology experts","Owner":"Community management authorities"}]}
